segments.text: Peter , it's time to go home now ! Hurry up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , it's almost noon . We have to go home and make lunch for your sister .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet she will hang around with her mates after school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Peter , it's a quarter to twelve . Let's go home now !
segments.speaker: S1
